boardgame.name: Sal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s World War II Game: Europe
Unconditional Surrender! World War 2 in Europe
boardgame.description: (from the designer and GMT Games website:)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Unconditional Surrender! World War 2 in Europe (USE) is a strategic level game covering the World War II European Theater. Players make the political decisions and control the military forces of the three major factions that struggled for European dominance and survival._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With its emphasis on force projection and decision making, players remain focused on the big picture of managing their front lines and political opportunities. Through simple mechanics and low on-map counter density, players easily handle the strategic action without a myriad of complicated subsystems or tall stacks of counters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As one gamer put it, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;It is a delight to be spending my limited brain power on making (or agonizing over) operational decisions that are as dependent upon guts as they are gray matter. This game is not a series of arithmetic exercises, and the only variable in these algorithms is nerve._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Though the focus is on the big picture, Unconditional Surrender! still delivers historical detail. Each country has an historical army level order of battle, and its relative economic strength and national will to fight are effectively and simply modeled. Also represented are such World War II events as airdrops, Free Forces, jets, naval evacuation, partisans, radar, railroad artillery guns, and ULTRA; all neatly woven into the game's core mechanics for ease of play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game has many scenarios ranging from quick playing individual campaigns to longer ones covering up to the entire war._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Design Highlights_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Scale: army, fleet, or air wing level units; 30-60 miles per hex; monthly turns _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Players: 2-4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Playing Time: 30 minutes to 50 hours, depending on the scenario_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Low On-Map Counter Density: The number of counters on the map is relatively low._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Simple Stacking: No more than one air, ground, convoy, or warship unit per hex._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; No Factors on Counters: There are no combat or movement factors on counters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Single Combat System: One combat resolution sequence and Combat Results Table covers all types of combat, yet the results differ for air/naval, ground, or strategic combat. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Integrated Movement/Combat System: Units move and fight in a combined activation. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Use it or Lose it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; Economic System: Simple math with minimal record keeping_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Historical or Variable Entry: Units and events can enter play using an historical or variable time line. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Variable Politics: Most countries_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; belligerence and faction alliance is not predetermined._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Solitaire Friendly: Though not designed with solitaire rules, the mechanics easily allow one player to play the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; PBEM Capable: The game can be played using PBEM software, but its mechanics require frequent exchanges._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;TIME SCALE: Monthly Turns_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MAP SCALE: 30 to 40 miles per hex_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;UNIT SCALE: Army, Fleet or Wing_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DESIGNER: Salvatore Vasta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DEVELOPER: Mark Dey_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MAP ART: Salvatore Vasta _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Mark Simonitch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;COUNTER ART: Charlie Kibler_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Game is unpunched and in excellent shape. I will ship anywhere in the world and never ask more then actual shipping costs. Shipping of multiple items can be combined. Payment through PayPal (worldwide) or bank transfer (within EU). Any questions? Just ask!

GMT Games (GMT1402) Unconditional Surrender! World War 2 in Europe is a strategic level game covering the World War Two_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s European Theater. Players control the political decisions and military forces of the Axis, Western, and Soviet factions that struggled for European dominance and survival. With its emphasis on force projection and decision making, players focus on the big picture of managing military fronts and political opportunities. Through the use of simple mechanics and low on-map counter density, players easily handle the strategic action without a myriad of complicated subsystems or tall stacks of counters. Though the focus is on the big picture, the game delivers historical detail. Each country in the game has an historical army level order of battle, and the relative strength of its economy and national will to fight are effectively and simply modeled. Also represented are such World War II events as airdrops, Free Forces, jets, naval evacuation, partisans, radar, heavy artillery, and ULTRA; all of which are woven into the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s core mechanics for ease of play. Unconditional Surrender! has 16 scenarios ranging from individual campaigns to the entire war.
All components in very good shape. Payment by Paypal or wire transfer.
In shrink

*** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $7,000 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $12 shipping to continental US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover. And if you want this game plus anything else that I am selling on BGG, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course be happy to add other items on in order to save you on shipping! North Carolina residents pay 7% sales tax. Cheers, Jason
In shrink. Please check out my other games for sale!

Complete and in like-new condition. Counters neatly clipped, sorted, and bagged. Map, charts, rules all like-new. Box clean and like-new. Includes original dice. Shipping in the US will be by USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate, $11.30.

Opened, but unpunched counter copy in like new, unplayed condition. Box bottom corners have some rubbing from storage but otherwise, game and components are like new. Buyer to pay priority mail shipping and paypal fees if that payment option is used.

I bought this on a whim as the inventory in the supply chain dwindled, thinking it looked like a game I would play with my buddy, since we enjoy WWII 2p games. The game arrived, I read an electronic copy of the rules, and quickly realized I was WRONG. So, I have an in-the-shrink copy of this game to sell now. Shipping: Buyer pays for fully insured USPS priority shipping, which will be at most $15 (best guess - this may or may not fit flat rate). This should be less if you live closer to northern Indiana. Payment: I take Paypal, USPS Money Orders, and Walmart Money Orders. Bitcoin works too. I will also trade straight up for a copy of FIELDS OF ARLE in shrink. Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ask about other trades since I am not interested, unless you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re offering a Small World Designer Edition or A World At War or Arcadia or something extravagant like that.

Unconditional Surrender Europe (USE - GMT) is like new: Shrink wrap removed and box opened – that’s all! PAYMENT OPTIONS: European Bank Transfer will always be preferred. Otherwise, PAYPAL will be accepted, but with a price increase corresponding to the actual fee at the moment of PURCHASE. SHIPPING: The package (game, wrapping and box) weight will be above 1Kg. The costs below reflect the Belgian Posts Office tariffs at the time of creation of the announce: The actual shipping costs paid by the buyer will ALWAYS be the real ones applicable at the moment of PURCHASE. For more information on the BPO tariffs, please check their web site: [In French] http://www.bpost.be/site/fr/residential/pricing/prices.html To Belgium: Bpack 24h: 0-2Kg: 6.50 € Bpack Secur: 0-2Kg: 7.70 € To neighbouring countries: [France, Germany, Great-Britain, Luxembourg and Netherlands] Bpack World Light: [no tracking] 1-2 Kg: 17.40 € Bpack World: [with tracking] 0-10 Kg: 16.40 € To the rest of Europe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; USA: Bpack World Light: [no tracking] 1-2 Kg: 26.10 € Bpack World: [with tracking] 0-5 Kg: 32.80 € For more information, please send me a message.
